description:

Sinclair Broadcasting came out swinging, accusing opponents of DRM "astroturfing" the issue. Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

title: ATSC 3 Update: Sinclair Accuses us of Astroturfing DRM Nextgen TV Concerns for Cord Cutters
